H0.text: Which fruit is known in Portuguese as a marmelo, the first marmalades being made from this fruit. Apricot

H1.text: Which fruit is known in Portuguese as a marmelo, the first marmalades being made from this fruit. Plum

H2.text: Which fruit is known in Portuguese as a marmelo, the first marmalades being made from this fruit. Peach

H3.text: Which fruit is known in Portuguese as a marmelo, the first marmalades being made from this fruit. QUINCE

A4.text: The term 'marmalade', originally meaning a quince jam, derives from marmelo, the Portuguese word for this fruit.
